channel.title: Hey Star & Mopar, Frost is back. :/
channel.description:
Frostbyte100 is back. He said to me on MSN he may scam again this time. Please consider IP ban. That guy scammed twice, he gets off scott free. :eek:
Do something, not just because of what he did to me, but who knows who will affect next time.
Heh, for the paranoid, maybe he's a jagex mod trying to get people in trouble. :| :P

item.title: Hey Star & Mopar, Frost is back. :/
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“Your Grandpa, post:10, topic:6698”][quote author=Starblaster100 link=topic=9254.msg102406#msg102406 date=1154191426]
its hard to ban people like him because he just keeps proxying in again. Ill do what i can though, thanks for the info[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 08:37:28 PM[/size][hr]Mopar - I’ve started a Proxy Ban List, any proxies you find, just ban, e.g

200...*

If anyone has problems logging in, we can always remove specific onecs. But i doubt anyone will visit us from Brazil, Japan etc.
[/quote]I hope you do keep in mind that ip address ranges don’t represent countries in any way, they are mostly random with some blocks assigned for some companies. Btw, i suggest you ban 127...* from connecting to the forum database, that range is known to contain many hackers[/quote]
including mysql. damn mysql

Read full topic

200...*

If anyone has problems logging in, we can always remove specific onecs. But i doubt anyone will visit us from Brazil, Japan etc. ;)[/quote]

rofl starblaster:

IP: 210.*.*.* 1 IP: 221.*.*.* 0 IP: 202.*.*.* 1 IP: 201.*.*.* 14 IP: 200.*.*.*

you banned half the world :P, as you can see already 16 people cannot get to here, and one of them is RsN, I think we just gotta deal with the proxies on a one at a time basis :o
